Description of noncompliance with terms: Out of season direct diversion (Nov., Jan.) and storage (Sep).  See comments.
Some apparent out of season storage

Description of intake location changes: The water used under this permit was drawn from the Carnelian Woods Well because of the water quality problems associated with the use of the surface source identified as the Point of Diversion under Application 001379.  The North Tahoe Public Utility District is studying the feasibility of a variety of improvements to its systems; under consideration is work on a surface water diversion point to take the place of the Point of Diversion identified under this permit.
Description of noncompliance with terms: Potential out of season direct diversion.  Potential diversions within curtailment period.
Description of place of use changes: Petitions in process to facilitate the San Joaquin River Restoration Program.
Description of type of use changes: Petitions in process to facilitate the San Joaquin River Restoration Program.
